name: MonkAuth
description: Generic authentication operations for the Monk API. Supports four actions: register (create new tenant and get JWT token), login (authenticate to existing tenant), refresh (renew JWT token before expiration), and status (check current authentication state). Use MonkAuthRegister or MonkAuthLogin convenience tools for common operations. This tool caches the JWT token in memory for the session, so subsequent API calls automatically include authentication headers. Returns tenant information, username, and token expiration time on successful authentication.

template.description: Template name for new tenant (register only, defaults to "system")
